abstract: Citigroup, Merrill Lynch and three other banks have been hit with a shareholder lawsuit accusing the banks of failing to warn investors about proposed accounting-rule changes that lowered the value of preferred Fannie Mae stock.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, Merrill Lynch and three other banks have been hit with a shareholder lawsuit accusing the banks of failing to warn investors about proposed accounting-rule changes that lowered the value of preferred Fannie Mae stock.
